questions.question_text:
A company wants to run production workloads on AWS. The company needs concierge service, a designated AWS technical account manager (TAM), and technical support that is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
Which AWS Support plan will meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
AWS enterprise support - asthe concierge support , TAM in included only in Enterprise support

Selected Answer: B
AWS Enterprise Support

Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Enterprise Support
Enterprise support

Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Enterprise Support

Selected Answer: B
AWS Enterprise Support is the highest level of support offered by AWS and provides access to a range of benefits and services, including a dedicated technical account manager (TAM). The TAM serves as a single point of contact, providing personalized guidance and assistance in utilizing AWS services effectively, optimizing workloads, and addressing technical inquiries or issues.

In addition to the TAM, AWS Enterprise Support offers concierge service, which provides assistance with billing and account-related inquiries, service limit increases, and general operational support.

AWS Enterprise Support also includes 24/7 technical support, ensuring that assistance is available around the clock for critical issues or emergencies.

Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Enterprise Support

questions.question_text: When designing AWS workloads to be operational even when there are component failures, what is an AWS best practice?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
REL 11: How do you design your workload to withstand component failures?
Best Practices: Fail over to healthy resources: Ensure that if a resource failure occurs, that healthy resources can continue to serve requests.
https://wa.aws.amazon.com/wat.question.REL_11.en.html

Selected Answer: C
C. Design for automatic failover to healthy resources.

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer.

Selected Answer: D
DDOS -> shield

Selected Answer: D
D. AWS Shield Advanced

"AWS Shield Advanced protection provides always-on, flow-based monitoring of network traffic and active application monitoring to provide near real-time notifications of suspected DDoS incidents. AWS Shield Advanced also employs advanced attack mitigation and routing techniques for automatically mitigating attacks. Customers with Business or Enterprise support can also engage the Shield Response Team (SRT) 24x7 to manage and mitigate their application layer DDoS attacks. "

https://aws.amazon.com/shield/faqs/#:~:text=AWS%20Shield%20Advanced%20protection,application%20layer%20DDoS%20attacks.

Selected Answer: D
its D.

AWS Shield Advanced
https://aws.amazon.com/shield/faqs/

Selected Answer: D
AWS Shield Advanced provides near real-time visibility into attacks on your resources and a dedicated AWS team to assist with DDoS attacks. It provides a higher level of protection than AWS Shield Standard, which is automatically included for free on all AWS accounts. AWS Shield Standard offers limited protection against common and most frequently occurring DDoS attacks.

AWS WAF is a web application firewall that helps protect web applications from common web exploits, and Amazon Macie is a security service that uses machine learning to automatically discover, classify, and protect sensitive data in AWS.

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

Selected Answer: D
D. AWS Shield Advanced

AWS Shield Advanced is a service that provides protection against DDoS attacks for resources hosted on AWS. It includes near real-time visibility into attacks and a dedicated AWS team that provides expert assistance during an attack. Additionally, it provide protection for resources such as Application Load Balancers and Amazon CloudFront distributions, which meet the company's requirements. AWS Shield Advanced provides a higher level of protection compared to AWS Shield Standard and additional features such as automatic attack detection and response, and continuous monitoring and protection.

I think D. AWS Shield Advanced
Shield Advanced provides expanded DDoS attack protection.

questions.question_text:
A company wants to protect resources that the company hosts on AWS, including Application Load Balancers and Amazon CloudFront distributions. The company wants an AWS service that can provide near real-time visibility into attacks on the company's resources. The service must also have a dedicated AWS team to assist with distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.

Which AWS service will meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. AWS Enterprise Support

"Designated Technical Account Manager (TAM) to proactively monitor your environment and assist with optimization and coordinate access to programs and AWS experts"

https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/plans/#:~:text=Designated%20Technical%20Account%20Manager%20(TAM)%20to%20proactively%20monitor%20your%20environment%20and%20assist%20with%20optimization%20and%20coordinate%20access%20to%20programs%20and%20AWS%20experts

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

Selected Answer: D
Enterprise support
